findings.title: Security Misconfiguration with the config `secret_key` set to a static value `i_am****`.
findings.description:
Flask application is not configured correctly for deployment to production and live environments. Default settings that are more appropriate for development environment are in use.

NOTE: Some recommended settings may have to be set for every route even when using blueprint design pattern.

## Additional information

**[OWASP-A6](https://owasp.org/www-project-top-ten/OWASP_Top_Ten_2017/Top_10-2017_A6-Security_Misconfiguration)**

**[Flask Security](https://flask-security.readthedocs.io/en/develop/configuration.html)**

**[Flask Security Considerations](https://flask.palletsprojects.com/en/1.1.x/security/#security-considerations)**

**[Flask Configuration](https://flask.palletsprojects.com/en/1.1.x/api/#configuration)**

details.name: Security Misconfiguration with the config `secret_key` set to a static value `i_am****`.

findings.title: Security Misconfiguration with the config `PREFERRED_URL_SCHEME` not set to the recommended value `https` for production use.
findings.description:
Flask application is not configured correctly for deployment to production and live environments. Default settings that are more appropriate for development environment are in use.

NOTE: Some recommended settings may have to be set for every route even when using blueprint design pattern.

details.name: Security Misconfiguration with the config `PREFERRED_URL_SCHEME` not set to the recommended value `https` for production use.
details.snippetText:

from flask import Flask, request, jsonify
from inshorts import getNews
from flask_cors import CORS

findings.title: Security Misconfiguration with the config `SESSION_COOKIE_SECURE` not set to the recommended value `True` for production use.
findings.description:
Flask application is not configured correctly for deployment to production and live environments. Default settings that are more appropriate for development environment are in use.

NOTE: Some recommended settings may have to be set for every route even when using blueprint design pattern.

findings.title: Consider adding Flask-Security and Flask-Talisman security extensions to your Flask apps.
findings.description:
Flask-Security allows you to quickly add common security mechanisms to your Flask application. Flask-Social can also be used to add social or OAuth login and connection management.

## Additional information

**[OWASP-A6](https://owasp.org/www-project-top-ten/OWASP_Top_Ten_2017/Top_10-2017_A6-Security_Misconfiguration)**

**[Flask Talisman](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/flask-talisman)**
